website_summaries.verdict: Simple setup and easy-to-use dials make this baseball-themed scoreboard a home run.
pros: Large numbers are legible up to 50' away
Blank area offers room to print team names, rosters or sponsors
Mounts to fence quickly using hook-and-loop closure straps
cons: Cannot write on blank area with dry erase marker
Meant for use with vinyl graphics

customer_reviews.title: Great scoreboard!
customer_reviews.text: Love this scoreboard! 5th season using it. Always get compliments. No more asking what the score is during our many softball games. This is NOT flimsy as one review said very sturdy and has endured the weather, and constantly being thrown in the back of my van or stuff put on top of it. Only negative is even tho I used dry erase markers it doesn’t wipe off so the team names are permanent. I’ll have to used paper to cover it when I have to use it for other daughter’s games but Worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: osomello

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Love this scoreboard. Easy to use and durable. Have been using for about 3 years now. Still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my dads softball team so we can all see the score. Just wish it was a tad sturdier. We have to be careful where we hang it but it serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, Not worth the cost!
customer_reviews.text: This is simply corrugated cardboard and was $40!! I thought that the middle area would be for a dry erase marker and it does not wipe off well at all! So I’m not sure what you are supposed to do with that space. The board is way bigger than you would really want it to be to use on a backstop . Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: KKE27

customer_reviews.title: No more "Coach, are we winning?"
customer_reviews.text: This is very durable and portable, and my 10U softball team loves being able to move the dial when we score a run. And now they or the parents no longer ask me "are we winning?" Just be sure to factor in to the cost the price of doing something with that white space. For me, it was $8 worth of stickers.
customer_reviews.author: K. McMillan

customer_reviews.title: This is a super solution to anyone organizing sports games
customer_reviews.text: This is a super solution to anyone organizing sports games. We have a weekly pick up game and its a perfect solution at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Why do boys love score boards?
customer_reviews.text: Why do little boys love score boards? I have no idea but they really do and this was a great hit as a birthday present. I had to play basketball so we could use the score board. The board is sturdy and the kids love to turn the numbers. Two thumbs up

product_meta.title: ScoreSign Portable Baseball/Softball Scoreboard
product_meta.description: The patented ScoreSign is ideal for youth baseball games. Easy to carry with you to each game. Mounts on the backstop or baseline fence using Velcro straps. Scores both teams from 0 to 99, and also displays innings frm 1 to 9 and X. Weighs only 3 lbs. White area to apply sponsorship or team logo. Geat Fund Raiser, and better than a banner!
feature_bullets: Very Portable carry it to all your games, weighs only 2.8 lbs.
Compact only 24” wide by 18” tall, yet easy to read.
Mounts Anywhere in seconds using Velcro straps
Durable and All-Weather, wind Resistant using bottom straps.
Advertising / Sponsorship can be applied to front
